definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: We are committed to carrying out settlement audit for construction engineering and calculating the construction cost impartially and fairly.
sentences.chinese: 對建設工程進行決算審計，公正公平地確定工程造價。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, just a quarter of auditors moving to in-house roles in the City are women.
sentences.chinese: 同時，倫敦城內四分之一改爲坐班的審計師爲女性。

sentences.english: History and status of audit runs.
sentences.chinese: 審計運行的歷史和狀態。

sentences.english: Auditable management of content is required to meet the requirements of increasing regulated environments
sentences.chinese: 內容的審計管理需要滿足不斷調整的環境的需求。

sentences.english: Provide a framework for performing and promoting a broad range of value-added internal auditing.
sentences.chinese: 提供一個框架，表演和促進廣泛的增值的內部審計。

sentences.english: And he replied by saying, "We hire the very best auditors."
sentences.chinese: 他對此並沒有回答“我公司僱有最好的審計師們”。

sentences.english: A tenacious auditor might want to make an example out of you.
sentences.chinese: 某個固執的審計員說不定想拿你來殺雞儆猴。

sentences.english: Auditing as a social-science discipline, has its own hypotheses as well.
sentences.chinese: 審計學作爲一門社會學科，也有其自身的審計假設。

sentences.english: Auditing as a social-science discipline, has its own hypotheses as well.
sentences.chinese: 審計學作爲一門社會學科，也有其自身的審計假設。

sentences.english: Just iterate over the array of property names looking for the audit fields.
sentences.chinese: 只需循環遍歷屬性名數組，尋找審計字段。

sentences.english: The rapid development of non-audit services causes hot debate.
sentences.chinese: 非審計服務的飛速發展引發了激烈的爭論。

sentences.english: I think there is quite a bit that auditors can do.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，審計師有很多方法可以發現這些舞弊。

sentences.english: Heighening the audit work is the need of upholding the discipline of finance and economics.
sentences.chinese: 加強審計工作是維護財經紀律的需要。

sentences.english: But love is a breeze compared to accelerating an audit.
sentences.chinese: 愛情需要和風細雨，但審計必須快馬加鞭。

sentences.english: I teach a concept in my auditing classes that fits perfectly here.
sentences.chinese: 我所教授的審計課程中有一個概念在這裏非常適合。

sentences.english: At the same time, accounting fraud has attacked the entire audit field seriously.
sentences.chinese: 同時，也給整個審計職業界以沉重的打擊。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
